short_summary: Procurement for a remote field camp to support up to 14 people at Angikuni Lake, Nunavut, required to be built/supplied by July 3, 2024, and decommissioned between August 1-August 2, 2024. The provisions of fuel, groceries, expediting services, crew mobilized/demobilized are also required along with the services of a camp cook and field camp manager.
description: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking proposals from bidders for a remote field camp to support up to 14 people at Angikuni Lake, Nunavut, is required to be built/supplied by July 3, 2024, and decommissioned between August 1-August 2, 2024. The provisions of fuel, groceries, expediting services, crew mobilized/demobilized are also required along with the services of a camp cook and field camp manager.

full_summary:
### Angikuni Lake, Nunavut, Remote Field Camp #1
#### Solicitation Information
• **Solicitation Number**: NRCan-5000079427
• **Tender Closing Date**: May 28, 2024 14:00:00
• **Contracting Entity**: Natural Resources Canada, 580 Booth St, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4, Canada


#### Project Description
Natural Resources Canada invites proposals to provide one remote field camp to support up to 14 people at Angikuni Lake, Nunavut.
#### Deliverables
* Supply and build a remote field camp requiring on-site premise management
* Provide 14-day accommodations, amenities, and services for personnel
* Identification of accommodation and equipment:
    •
* Furnish permanent general-purpose living quarters, kitchen, and washer facilities and, options for additional portable washrooms
* Action for:
    • Pre-arrigation, confirmation and logistics commence 4 (four) weeks prior to the services
    • Pre-site day 1-14 meal provision being expected beginning 02:00 AM on the next on-site day
* Plan for cooking area management for restricted use:
    • Designate specific cooking wares usage (Kitchen Pots Apparels Gauge Kits Cleaning done date:PMP Environmental letters irregular handling)


#### Mandatory Deliverables and Requirements:
* Full Character Limited with capacity review extensive compact service CM items
